title: how to player creations
body: I have an idea about new champion but I can't create a discussion because my levle is too low. how can I increase my level

replies.body:
To the best of my knowledge it's because your boards profile is bugged/hasn't updated properly.

Some boards have a level requirement (as in your summoner/account level in game) to post in them, but your profile displays you as LEVEL NULL, hence the inability to post.

[Submit a support ticket](http://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) under "I am having technical issues" and specifically mention it is your boards profile that is bugged (a screenshot would do wonders) and someone can fix it for you.
